user_profile.name: Kwame Adom
user_profile.description: Kwame is a 48-year-old man from Ghana who approaches life with a friendly demeanor, despite his tendency to be very impulsive. With limited technical experience, he prefers clear and concise communication, making him keen on organizing simple tasks like arranging transportation to the clinic, especially as he pays great attention to details. His sedentary lifestyle has prompted him to seek out regular health check-ups, making this task a priority for both his health and well-being.

instructions.dialogue: Share some key information but keep some details private.
instructions.profile: Share most of your profile information when asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express clear emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

additional_requirements: Driver who understands basic health-related needs
